entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pickle Lake Airport 6:55 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -20.8°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -24.1°C
Wind: N 15 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
